sense.name: compliment or honor the efforts of
sense.examples: We salute the workers in the labor movement for their hard work. Let's all salute the birthday girl! The Allies saluted the Turkish flag and vice versa. Father saluted my courage that day.

sense.name: greet
sense.commentary:
NP1[+animate] SALUTE [+animate]
NOTE: This sense involves communication between two people (note this specifically in the 2nd sentence).
sense.examples: Every day on my way to work, the old man salutes me. Sir John saluted the Admiral with eleven guns, he answered with 9. Privates, salute your captain!

sense.name: become noticable
sense.examples: An odd smell saluted our nostrils.
